Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraActivity.EXTRA_IN_BACK_BUTTON_SHOULD_CLOSE_LIBRARY
    The option to close the library with the back button from any screen will be removed in a future version.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    net.gini.android.vision.Document.getJpeg()
    Use Document.getData() instead. This method might return a byte array containing other types, like PDFs.

    To check if the byte array contains an image query the type with Document.getType() and check if it equals Document.Type.IMAGE.
    net.gini.android.vision.Document.getRotationForDisplay()
    Use ImageDocument.getRotationForDisplay() instead, if Document.getType() equals Document.Type.IMAGE.
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentCompat.hideCameraTriggerButton()
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentInterface.hideCameraTriggerButton()
    Use CameraFragmentInterface.hideInterface() instead.
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentStandard.hideCameraTriggerButton()
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentCompat.hideDocumentCornerGuides()
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentInterface.hideDocumentCornerGuides()
    Use CameraFragmentInterface.hideInterface() instead.
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentStandard.hideDocumentCornerGuides()
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentCompat.showCameraTriggerButton()
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentInterface.showCameraTriggerButton()
    Use CameraFragmentInterface.showInterface() instead.
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentStandard.showCameraTriggerButton()
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentCompat.showDocumentCornerGuides()
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentInterface.showDocumentCornerGuides()
    Use CameraFragmentInterface.showInterface() instead.
    net.gini.android.vision.camera.CameraFragmentStandard.showDocumentCornerGuides()
